SELECT window_start AS time,
       avg(ip_entropy) AS value
FROM soc.features
WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT window_start AS time,
       avg(api_abuse_rate) AS value
FROM soc.features
WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT *
FROM (
  SELECT created_at, window, project, ip, identity, rule_id, severity, description
  FROM (
    SELECT rm.created_at, rm.window, rm.project,
           anyHeavy(JSONExtractString(toJSONString(rm.evidence), 'ip')) AS ip,
           rm.identity, rm.rule_id, rm.severity, rm.description
    FROM soc.rule_matches rm
    WHERE rm.window >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND startsWith(rm.rule_id, 'net.')
    GROUP BY rm.created_at, rm.window, rm.project, rm.identity, rm.rule_id, rm.severity, rm.description
  )
  ORDER BY created_at DESC
  LIMIT 200
)
ORDER BY created_at ASC
